Good Comments: They did good with the few they did.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Grendizer: Getter Robo G - Great Mazinger Kessen! Daikaijuu

Good Comments: No flaws in subbing noticable to me, though I'm not proficient in Japanese, so I cannot evaluate translation.
Simple and plain, easy to understand english sub.
subs are mediocre, but they're the only ones who subbed it
Bad Comments: quality not that good but they are one of the only subbers.. all in all decent

Good Comments: Good translations, simple but nice typesetting, great quality as well
To far from original (IMHO)   hardsub   one time bad timing   bags in encoding.
Simple and decent translations. Timing is sometimes off and some minor lines are left unsubbed.
quite possibly their worse release, a lot of inaccurate translations and improper grammar
Bad Comments: Translations are often wrong, timing is sometimes off, no karaoke. Really bad job...
Translation are often inaccurate, missing the point of what was really said...
Grammar is awful, translations are at times overly literal, other times incorrect. Odd choices of words...list goes on. Yuck.

Good Comments: I like them because they are accurate in their subbings. The grammar doesn't miss a beat.
They are not "accurate in their subbings", you stupid faaggot. Sumimasen does not = Thank you, for fuck's sake.
Tons of errors, bad translation, timing errors, and general bad quality. Wait for [EG] to finish.
Bad Comments: Poor translations. Subs are no good.
Unfortunately, only softsubbed version: Translation very bad and video quality low. After all, best version :(
Bad Translation and some obvious glaring timing errors. It's shame that they're the only group who finished.
hammy translations that are inaccurate, but the only one available :(
Simple and readable subtitles. But strange phrases.

Good Comments: As with their other Gundam projects, the translation is off quite often.
translations were often wrong & increasingly so as series progressed. Sometimes the opposite meaning and sometimes complete nonsense.
Bad Comments: Horrible encodes and fluctuating translation quality. Watch the AG release if you can.
The translation is often times inaccurate, as with all of Hero Legends' works.
